title: #309 - Liberty, Harm, and a Ride on the Bus
itunes:title: #309 - Liberty, Harm, and a Ride on the Bus
description: This week, Connor and Dan break quarantine in order to venture into the land of make believe. It's thought experiment time! Should people be free to do harmless actions? What if they're really gross? What if I'm just trying to get to work and they're being really gross? These are the pressing questions answered on this week's episode (sort of).
